install.question: How do I install ShiggyCord?
install.intro: The method depends on your device:
install.ios_note: Note: We do not provide support for iOS due to lack of maintainers.

version.question: Can ShiggyCord run on Android 8.1 and below?
version.answer: No. For non-rooted users, it's not possible. For rooted users, finding a compatible LSPosed fork for older versions is difficult, and we won't be forking it for this purpose.

rooting.question: Do you provide support for rooting my device?
rooting.answer_prefix: No. Rooting is complex and device-specific. We recommend checking
rooting.answer_suffix: for a guide specific to your model.

questions.question: What is the difference between ShiggyCord and others?
questions.answer: ShiggyCord focuses on a refreshed, user-friendly settings interface and utilizes 'Core Plugins' for a more integrated experience.

questions.question: Is ShiggyCord affiliated with Kettu?
questions.answer: It's a fork that has evolved into its own independent project. It started as an unofficial build but is now separate.

legal.title: Legal & Safety
legal.question: Is this against Discord's Terms of Service?
legal.answer: Yes. Like any third-party modification, it violates Discord's ToS. Use it at your own risk. While there are no known bans for client mods alone, safety is never 100% guaranteed.

other.title: Other
other.question: Do you recommend RPC apps like Kizzy or Metrolist?
other.answer_body: No. These are considered self-bots and can lead to account disables. We recommend using Pano Scrobbler with the Multi Scrobbler plugin for the safest experience.
other.note: Note: Metrolist only supports YouTube Music. For Tidal, Apple Music, etc., use Pano Scrobbler.
